statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
an = X*an-1 + Y and Y mod (X-1) = 0.
Your task is to calculate the smallest positive integer k that ak mod a0 = 0.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: Each line will contain only three integers X, Y, a<sub>0</sub> ( 1 < X < 2<sup>31</sup>, 0 <= Y < 2<sup>63</sup>,  0 < a<sub>0</sub> < 2<sup>31</sup>).

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each case, output the answer in one line, if there is no such k, output "Impossible!".
